entry.title: Big Calculator: How Texas Instruments Monopolized Math Class
entry.quote: These $100 calculators have been required in classrooms for more than 20 years, as students and teachers still struggle to afford them

entry.title: Digital Tools I Wish Existed
entry.quote: ...the core issue is an extraordinarily high level of friction in the process of finding, organizing, and sharing digital content.

entry.title: The Deep Learning Revolution and Its Implications for Computer Architecture and Chip Design
entry.quote: This paper is a companion paper to a keynote talk at the 2020 International Solid-State Circuits Conference (ISSCC) discussing some of the advances in machine learning, and their implications on the kinds of computational devices we need to build, especially in the post-Moore's Law-era. It also discusses some of the ways that machine learning may also be able to help with some aspects of the circuit design process.

entry.title: Endless River: An Overview of DataViz for Categorical Data
entry.quote: Let us explore some flow and network chart types that are ready-made for visual storytelling using categorical data

entry.title: Big Tech’s Big Defector
entry.quote: Roger McNamee made a fortune as one of Silicon Valley’s earliest champions. Now he’s one of its most fervent critics.
